item.title: 如何将网络流转化为内存流 C#
item.description: //将获取的文件流转化为内存流 public static MemoryStream ConvertStreamToMemoryStream(Stream stream) { MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream(); if (stream != null) { byte[] buffer = ReadFull(stream); if (buffer != null) { var binaryWriter = new BinaryWriter(memoryStream); binaryWriter.Write(buffer); } } return memoryStream; } public static byte[] ReadFull(Stream input) { byte[] buffer = new byte[16 * 1024]; using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream()) { int read; while ((read = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0) { ms.Write(buffer, 0, read); } return ms.
